body:
• The magic component that makes it easy to build well-behaved distributed applications
  • Is a single Erlang/OTP application which can easily be included in your Erlang app
  • Node management
    • Tracks node statuses in the cluster
    • Can programmatically remove nodes from the cluster
    • API for advertising and locating services around the cluster (handy for finding "special" nodes)
    • Generates events based on node activity
